title: Can't Pitch in?
body: I can't show a cool idea for Zoe in the Gameplay board. It says I need to be lvl 7, but I'm lvl 44! This doesn't make any sense...

replies.body: Your profile probably needed to sync, you can use the [syncing tool](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) if this is still an issue!
